title: Fantasy/Exploration/RPG Vol.2 - Music Pack
longDescription:
This Pack is designed for Enchanted Forests, Exploration, Fantasy, Fantastic Worlds and RPG games. 


Listen here.


This pack contains 86 files: 10 full tracks, loops, variations, layers and ambients; appropriate for forests, caves, exploration, deep emotions, characters and battles. 


All you need for interactive game music.


(Check out Fantasy/Exploration/RPG Vol.1)
